The claim was published on Facebook on M: 2020, and has been shared more than 60 times.
The claim states that the virus remains: 3. Hong Kong’s Centre for Food and Safety stated on Facebook that there is no evidence to support the claim that people can be infected with the coronavirus from food.
The CDC: US Food and Drug Administration, and EFSA all stated that there is no evidence to support the transmission of COVID-19 through food.
